article_title: Erratum In The Adler-Cannon Amicus Briefs Filed In 'Halbig' & 'King'

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: The Durbin bill did condition benefits to individuals on state action as we claimed, just not the benefits we claimed.
